champ.champInfo:
The general management of the organization and conduct of competitions is carried out by the department of non-Olympic sports of sports of the department of physical culture and non-Olympic sports of the Ministry of Youth and Sports of Ukraine (hereinafter - the Ministry of Youth Sports) together with the NGO "National Kyokushinkai Karate Federation of Ukraine" (hereinafter – Federation). The direct holding of the competition is entrusted to the Department of Humanitarian Policy of Vinnytsia regional state administration, Public organization "Vinnytsia regional federation of kyokushinkai karate", the main panel of judges approved by the Federation.

The chief judge of the competition is a sports judge from kyokushinkai karate of the international shihan category Oleksandr Valeriyovych Goncharenko, 6th dan (Vinnytsia)

Competition judging is conducted in accordance with the standards and rules of the International Kyokushinkai Karate Organization (5 judges, flag signaling).

Venue of the competition: SC "Zdorovya", Vinnytsia, str. Yakov Shepelya, 23

The competition is held on December 10, 2023. The competition starts at 09:00

Regulations of the competition

December 9, 2023:

  • 10:00-16:00 - registration of competition participants, weighing, judges' seminar (Vasyl Poryk St., bldg.25)
  • 16:00-17:00 - draw of competition participants
  • 17:00-19:00 - judges' seminar

December 10, 2023:

  • 08:00-08:30 meeting of the technical secretariat of the competition
  • 08:30-08:45 meeting of competition judges
  • 09:00-13:00 qualifying competitions
  • 13:00-13:30 judges' lunch
  • 13:30-14:30 ceremonial opening of the competition (parade of participants of all sections of the competition)
  • 14:30-18:00 semi-final and final parts of the competition
  • 18:00-20:00 end of competition, awarding of winners and prize-winners, closing of competition

Categories of kumite men:

  • 2006-2007: -60 -65 -70 -75 -80 +80
  • 2008-2009: -50 -55 -60 -65 -70 -75 +75
  • adults: -65 -75 -85 -95 +95
  • veterans 35-40: -70 -80 +80
  • veterans 41-45: -70 -80 +80
  • veterans 46+: -70 -80 +80

Categories of kumite women:

  • 2006-2007: -50 -55 -60 -65 +65
  • 2008-2009: -50 -55 -60 -65 +65
  • adults: -50 -55 -60 -65 +65
  • veterans 35-40: -70 -80 +80
  • veterans 41-45: -70 -80 +80
  • veterans 46+: -70 -80 +80

Rules of matches:

  • 2006-2007: 2.0 min, 2.0 min, weigh-in, 2.0 min
  • 2008-2009: 1.5 min, 1.5 min, weighing, 1.5 min
  • Men/women qualifying: 2.0 min, 2.0 min, 2.0 min
  • Men/Women semi-final/final and all-around: 3.0 min, 2.0 min, weigh-in, 2.0 min
  • Veterans men/women: 2.0 min, 2.0 min, weigh-in, 2.0 min

Male and female participants compete in separate sections of the competition.
Participants compete in a sports uniform, according to the Rules of kyokushinkai karate competitions in force in Ukraine.

FEE FOR PARTICIPATION IN THE CUP – 900 UAH.

Athletes who took 1-3 places are awarded diplomas and medals of the Federation of the respective degrees.

Competition organizing committee:
